judgment.error: Order not uploaded by concerned court

business_details.Business: Accused Samaru Gunju is present. The accused has prayed for allowing him to remain on previous bail vide petition no. 915. Heard and same is allowed. Accused is furnished with the copies of relevant documents in terms of Section 207 Cr. P.C. I have heard the learned counsel for the accused and the learned APP and have also perused the records. From the charge sheet it is appears that the accused is alleged to have committed an offence punishable under section 366 of I.P.C read with Section 4 of POCSO Act which is exclusively triable by the Court of the Special Judge. Accordingly , the case is hereby sent to the Court of the Hon&amp#039ble Special Judge , Tinsukia. Send the case record and seized materials, if any, to the Court of the Hon&amp#039ble Special Judge, Tinsukia. Notify the Public Prosecutor. Bench Assistant is to take steps. The accused is to appear in the Court of the Hon&amp#039ble Special Judge, Tinsukia on 07/09/2019.
